mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (first_name, last_name, email, phone, job_title, salary, is_project_manager, employment_statuses_id, leave_types_id, departments_id) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{jobTitle}, #{salary}, #{isProjectManager}, #{employmentStatusesId}, #{leaveTypesId}, #{departmentsId})
mapper.update: UPDATE employees SET first_name=#{employee.firstName}, last_name=#{employee.lastName}, email=#{employee.email}, phone=#{employee.phone}, job_title=#{employee.jobTitle}, salary=#{employee.salary}, is_project_manager=#{employee.isProjectManager}, employment_statuses_id=#{employee.employmentStatusesId}, leave_types_id=#{employee.leaveTypesId}, departments_id=#{employee.departmentsId} WHERE id_employee=#{employee.idEmployee}
